name: Colissimo
description: This module allows Gladys to check package status, and send a notification if status is updated.
instructionsHTML:
Requirement

Need Gladys version >= 3.0.0.

Installation

  • Install the module in Gladys in the store.
  • Reboot Gladys.
  • Click on the scripts tab.
  • Choose the 'Colissimo' script.
  • Modify numbers of your packages in this script : var numeros = ['8n04446021774', '8n04446021775'];.
  • Each hour (At 00 minute), Gladys check status of each package, and send a notification if status is updated.
instructionsMarkDown:
## Requirement

Need Gladys version >= 3.0.0.

## Installation

* Install the module in Gladys in the store.
* Reboot Gladys.
* Click on the scripts tab.
* Choose the 'Colissimo' script.
* Modify numbers of your packages in this script : `var numeros = ['8n04446021774', '8n04446021775'];`.
* Each hour (At 00 minute), Gladys check status of each package, and send a notification if status is updated.
